results.name: wordpress-namespace/wordpress

error.Text: Service has not ready endpoints, pods: [Pod/wordpress-774d6fbf5c-kcb4j Pod/wordpress-774d6fbf5c-nlh2t Pod/wordpress-774d6fbf5c-6j8sl], expected 3

results.details:
Error: The service lacks ready endpoints; the expected 3 pods are not all running or ready.

Solution: 
1. Check pod status with `kubectl get pods`.
2. Inspect logs using `kubectl logs <pod-name>`.
3. Verify pod readiness probes.
4. Ensure sufficient resources and resolve any errors.
5. Restart pods if necessary.

results.name: wordpress-namespace/wordpress-774d6fbf5c-6j8sl

error.Text: Readiness probe failed: HTTP probe failed with statuscode: 500

results.details:
Error: The readiness probe failed because the application returned a 500 status code, indicating an internal server error.

Solution: 
1. Check application logs for errors.
2. Ensure all dependencies are running.
3. Verify configuration settings.
4. Restart the application.
